scenario_text.value:
The mountains... The fog is thickening around
them.

Yeah, looks like they’re completely covered
in that scary fog.

There’s no way we’re going to the mountains
now.
That’s for sure. So now what?

I guess you could say there are fewer places
for us to search, at least.

Like, we don’t need to search any areas with
fog...right? Huh?
Everyone! Enemies are coming out of the fog!
I won’t let them get near anyone!
